column4: If I install 5.04, is it possible to update the system to 5.10 or 6.06 automatically while the system is running?
yes, but it will require a reboot
but will it require manual configuration on my part?
ok. The installation cd seems to be incompatible with my system you see. But I know that 5.04 works, cause I installed it once.
didnt we work on this one?
when I try to install, it seems to go into an infinite loop when setting up primary installation repository or something?
ok, so you want to install hoary and update to breezy (and in a month or so, dapper)
it keeps saying that my locale is up to date, and that nothing is downloaded, updated, removed or installed. Then it sais the same thing about iso-something and then it goes back to the locale again.
